testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to access courses via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/courses endpoint with invalid (student or teacher) authorization credentials,

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: * The api user constructs the base url with the "student" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/courses" path parameters...........................passed * The api user sends a "GET" request and saves the returned response........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 203.........................passed * The api user confirms that the "remark" information in the response body is "failed"..passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "failed"..undefined * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "To access this data, you must log in as a admin.".skipped * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "To access this data, you must log in as a admin.".skipped
